body.description: Find the perfect heat and steam for any fabric type with the BLACK+DECKER™ Easy Steam Compact Iron. The new design* features the Even Steam Stainless Soleplate, which distributes steam more evenly from heel to tip for fast ironing. With Smart Steam Controls, the iron automatically regulates and optimizes steam levels based on the temperature you select for different fabric types. The Precision Point Soleplate makes it simple to navigate around buttons, collars, and creases for crisp, detailed results. Other features include: easy-fill water tank, Auto Clean system, burst of steam, and vertical steam. A full suite of useful features makes BLACK+DECKER the trusted name in clothes irons. *compared to BLACK+DECKER IR08X

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: EvenSteam TrueGlide Non-Stick Soleplate Even steam distribution from tip to heel helps tame wrinkles anywhere on garments. Smart Steam Control The easy-read control automatically regulates and optimizes steam levels based on the temperature setting you select. Dual Position Cord The cord is designed to toggle down so it stays out of the way while you iron. Spray Mist and Steam Burst Buttons The side-by-side buttons offer total moisture control. One delivers a burst of steam and the other a gentle spray mist.

Easy-fill Water Tank The water tank is designed for easy filling and features a large capacity relative to the compact size of the iron. Precision Point Soleplate The pointed tip of the soleplate makes it easy to navigate around details. Burst of Steam One button lets you quickly blast away tough wrinkles with a burst of dense steam. Spray Mist The push-button mister applies the right amount of moisture for quick wrinkle removal. Easy-fill Water Tank Precision Point Soleplate Burst of Steam Spray Mist

Specifcations EvenSteam TrueGlide Non-Stick Soleplate Smart Steam Control Dual Position Cord Spray Mist and Steam Burst Buttons Easy-fill Water Tank Design Vertical Steam Use the iron as a steamer for quick touch-ups right on the hanger or for steaming curtains and drapes. Anti-Drip Built-in safeguard prevents water from escaping the soleplate when the temperature is too low.

BLACK+DECKER Easy Steam Compact Iron, Blue, IR06V Find the perfect heat and steam for any ironable fabric with the BLACK+DECKER Easy Steam Compact Iron. The new design features the EvenSteam TrueGlide Non-Stick Soleplate, which distributes steam more evenly from tip to heel* for fast, effective ironing. With Smart Steam Controls, the iron automatically regulates and optimizes steam levels based on the temperature you select for different fabric types. The Precision Point Soleplate makes it simple to navigate around buttons, collars, and creases for crisp, detailed results. Other features include: easy-fill water tank, burst of steam, and vertical steam. A full suite of useful features makes BLACK+DECKER the trusted name in clothes irons. *compared to BLACK+DECKER IR08X

Precision Point Soleplate The pointed tip of the soleplate makes it easy to navigate around details. Burst of Steam One button lets you quickly blast away tough wrinkles with a burst of dense steam. Spray Mist The push-button mister applies the right amount of moisture for quick wrinkle removal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: had to replace my old iron. This iron is nice and lightweight, easy to use and works great.

reviews.reviewerName: Instruction are easy to follow. It works to remove the dirt on my husband suit pant. I will recommend.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: It is very easy to use. I been use it for couple times so far, no problems with it. Just a friendly reminder be careful with hot air that pop out on the side keep a good distance so you don’t get burn.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Heats up quickly, very light weight and easy toUse. Perfect for ironing dress shirts. Worth the money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Black and Deacker Iro6v steam iron
reviews.reviewText: This is the best iron I have had in a long time…proving that the product with the most features and highest price is not always the best buy.My old iron was quite expensive but was heavy and shut itself off during my sewing projects.This iron is lightweight, puts out lots of steam and does not shut itself off if I step away for a brief moment only to return to a cold iron.I love, love this iron! Price was great too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and easy to use.
reviews.reviewText: Heats up quickly and glides over fabric. Easy to work with as it is lightweight and fits into tight corners well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I needed to press some newly purchased, and heavily creased black out curtains, and even though this is a very light iron, it did the job beautifully.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I had been tired of auto on and off. This is easy to iron shirts. Not heavy. Powerful steam. Satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice little Iron.
reviews.reviewText: I got fed up with my big deluxe full sized Iron, it kept shutting down and cooling if I let it sit for a few minutes which was maddening because I sew handmade fabric items daily. I need to go back to iron while piecing, multiple times during product construction, finding it got cold. Maddening auto shut off! So, I decided to purchase a smaller easy to use iron, and this little black+decker is excellent. It stays warm and heats back up the second I move it and stays on till I unplug it. It also has a smaller tip, perfect for the creases and nooks of my designs. The price was affordable. The Iron is excellent for crafting, detail sewing. I’d buy it again.

reviews.reviewTitle: Super lightweight, working well, no dripping
reviews.reviewText: This is a super lightweight and compact iron with good gliding surface. It works well, no dripping so far, I find the cable to be long enough. It is compact, but the water tank is enough for about 10 minutes of ironing at full power without need for refill. Iron is only 1200 W, not 2000 W as stated here. I bought this IR06V variant for 40 CAD and preferred it over buying the cheaper one IR06VC sold for 25 CAD just because I thought it was 2000 W. I wonder what the difference between IR06V and IR06VC is. When used at maximum power the iron turns on every 15-20s when in use, which is a bit unusual. Anyways I use it for daily quick (max 5 minutes) ironing at full power and so far no issues with it. I might write an update later. And for those that might be concerned, I also had water droplets inside the tank, but this should be not something one should be worried about. It is actually a proof that this item was tested for quality.
Worth the money. very light weight and easy to use. works as expected.

reviews.reviewTitle: It is what it should be, for the money, but it is 1200W, NOT 2000W
reviews.reviewText: It works as expected. It it holds for 2-3 years, then it's worth it. The only problem I have is that the description on Amazon says clearly "2000W", which was a factor when I bought it, only to find out it's only 1200W. It would have been a 5 star for a 1200W iron. The seller should change the description and stop deceiving customers.

reviews.reviewTitle: Okay iron, but does not steam well
reviews.reviewText: Claims it can do vertical steaming but I have not been able to achieve that
